title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Cartman's house, morning. Stan, Kyle, and Tweek show up. Stan rings the doorbell. Liane comes to the door

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Oh, hello boys.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Hi. Uh, the school called and said we all have to start going to class again.

text: Oh, but I thought your teacher died.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: She did, but now they're saying we have to start going back to school anyways. It's totally gay.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Oh. Well, I'll tell Eric. He's just down in the basement playing with his dolls.

text: Cartman likes to play with dolls?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Cartman's basement. He's playing with a rubber lamb at the edge of a hole in the basement.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Hello, Precious. Yes, that's a good Precious.  Now it takes the lotion from the basket.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Oh please, mister. Please let me out of here.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: It puts the lotion on its skin or else it gets the hose again.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Bark bark bark bark!

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Yes, that's a good Precious. Okay, now it puts the lotion back in the basket.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Please, mister, let me out.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: It puts the lotion back in the basket!

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: I miss my Mom, mister. I wanna see my Mommy-

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Put the lotion in the fuckin' basket!

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Sweetie.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Yes Mom?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: You have to get ready for school

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: ...No, our teacher's dead. Remember?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Yes, but they said two weeks off was enough, and they want everyone back.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Two weeks isn't enough. I'm not over our teacher's tragic death. I'm still sh-shooken up.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: You'll get over it, honey.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: But I wanna plaaayyy.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: South Park Elementary, Fourth Grade. The kids pour into the classroom, chattering. Wendy walks up and starts talking to Red and Jordan

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: I can't believe it's been two weeks since I've seen you guys. What have you been doing?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Hey guys.

text: Hey Bebe.

text: You guys uh,  notice anything different?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Oh my God, Bebe. You got boobs.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Yeah, they started coming in last week. At first I thought they were just mosquito bites, but, then they didn't go away.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: M'kay kids, let's take our seats, m'kay? I know this has been a difficult couple o'weeks for you all with the untimely death of your teacher, but it's time for us to try to move on and learn, m'kay?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Mr. Mackey, I don't think I'm over the teacher's tragic death yet. I need more time. It's just... it still hurts, you know? Can I go home?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: No. Eric, what we're gonna do is learn to hide our emotions with math problems. M'kay, so let's start with some multiplication tables over here, m'kay. First we'll do uh, four time four, m'kay?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Dude, look at Bebe.  Something seems different about her.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Yeah, I noticed that too. Did she get a haircut or something?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: I don't know.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Hey Token. You know, I never noticed before, but that girl Bebe is... kinda cool.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: I was just thinking the same thing. It's like, she's a girl, but, she's someone you could hang out with.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Yeah. Bebe is kinda cool, huh?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Hey Craig, is that the same shirt that that Bebe chick always wears?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: I don't know. Why?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: It just... it just seems like a really awesome shirt.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Yeah. It kinda does.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Okay, and so uh,  so who can tell me the answer to the first problem, six times eight? Uh, Bebe?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: :	 Oh, uh, forty-eight?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Whoa.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: That is an awesome answer!

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Yeah!

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Dude! Bebe is really smart!

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Yeah. I never noticed that before. Maybe she's actually cool enough to hang out with us.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Yeah, may be.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: ...And I was like, "I'm not buying those shoes for twenty dollars."

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Ah, hey, Bebe.

text: Yeah?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Uh, we're gonna throw rocks at cars later on, and we thought maybe you'd like to join us.

text: Really?  I've never done that before.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Wuuhh, it's really fun.You toss these little rocks at cars, and if the driver gets angry, you blame me.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Yeah, it's cool.

text: Why sure, that sounds hellafun.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Hahahahahaha...

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Yeah.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Hellafun

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Right, heh.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Wow, hellafun. That's awesome.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: I'm gonna start saying that now.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Cool.  We'll see you later, Bebe.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Stan, you've never asked me to throw rocks at cars with you guys.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: That's different, dude. You're like, my girlfriend. Bebe's just... I don't know. She's just cool.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Yeah. She's really cool.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: It's weird how we never noticed before.

text: A hill just outside of town. The boys and Bebe are gathered at the summit

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: So what you do, see, is wait for a car to drive by that big pine tree. Then you chuck a rock at it. It's all about the timing.

text: You damn kids!

text: My paper is called, "Why Bebe is the coolest person, ever."

text: "My friend Bebe is really smart. She tells funny jokes and knows a lot about stuff. She's good at almost everything she tries. She's awesome. The end."

text: M'kay, very nice, Clyde. Uh, Token, why don't you read your paper?

text: "If I could be Bebe."  "If I was Bebe I would have lots of friends because I would be sooo great. I would make people smile and think wherever I went."

text: M'kay, interesting, Token, Uh... Who would like to go next?  Uh how about someone who didn't write about how cool Bebe is?

text: "Thumper is twelve years old. That's pretty old for a cat. The end."

text: God, you know what, that's so true? Because, you sometimes never really think about how old a pet is until it's gone.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Bebe's house, after school. She's looking out over the neighborhood from her bedroom window. Her mother stops by her door and looks in

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Bebe, is something the matter?

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Oh Mom, it's just... My girlfriends at school said some really mean things to me today.  They called me a slut, with a huge gaping vagina.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: Oh, sweetie. You're all just growing up.  Part of being a woman is having a friend one day and calling her a slut the next.

text: But am I slutty just because I'm beginning to be friends with guys? I mean, they just like me because they think I'm smart and cool.

title: BEBE S BOOBS DESTROY SOCIETY
text: I remember when I was a little girl the boys didn't think I was very smart at all. But then one day, they all started thinking I was really smart. I guess big smarts just run in our family.

text: Well if the girls don't wanna be my friend, that's fine!  Guys are way cooler, anyways.

text: Alright guys, now that we're all here, I think... we need to have a difficult conversation. It's obvious that Bebe is the like the coolest, smartest, most awesome person we've ever met.
